name: Blitzle
flavorText:
When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear.
It can catch lightning with its mane and store
the electricity.

previous.name: Unfezant
previous.flavorText:
Males swing their head plumage to
threaten opponents. The females’ flying
abilities surpass those of the males.

next.name: Zebstrika
next.flavorText:
They have lightning-like movements.
When Zebstrika run at full speed,
the sound of thunder reverberates.
